name: Chimp Cookies
description:
Demo Out!

"hi yes spit this is cool epic game i made" - Me

"Little Funny Chimpie Games" - Definitely not my friend Cameron

"Chimp Games" - From Wriest or something

Welcome to CHIMP COOKIES! A choose your own adventure story, with many different scenarios. 

Based on the choices you pick you can get different endings.

Thanks to Wriestteb for being a big part of helping! With some Ideas, and Ost and Backgrounds.

This game is in Development, But it should come over very soon!
